name: More Movies About Historical Figures Quiz | Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: Robert De Niro won critical acclaim for his performance as which boxing champion in 'Raging Bull'?
questions.explanation:
Jake LaMotta.

	The movie was also given great reviews.

questions.text: Which actor played the explorer, Henry Stanley, in 'Stanley and Livingstone'?
questions.explanation:
Spencer Tracy.

	Another fine Tracy role.

questions.text: Who played the title role in 'Becket'?
Which actor played the role of George M. Cohan in 'Yankee Doodle Dandy'?
questions.explanation:
James Cagney.

	Cagney handles song-and-dance man quite well.

questions.text: In 'All the President's Men', which actor played Washington Post editor Ben Bradlee?
questions.explanation:
Jason Robards.

	All were in the movie. Holbrook was the voice of 'Deep Throat'.

questions.text: In 'Somebody Up There Likes Me', Paul Newman played the role of which boxer?
Who played the title role in 'Lawrence of Arabia'?

Peter O'Toole.
